@schema.title: Schema URL
@schema.description: The absolute URL of the most recent major version of the relevant FAIRtracks JSON Schema that is backwards-compatible with the current JSON document. Must match the value of '$id' in the linked schema

doc_info.title: Document info
doc_info.description: Version and related information about the current FAIRtracks JSON document

local_id.title: Local ID
local_id.description: Identifier for this FAIRtracks JSON document (within the TrackFind database)

doc_url.title: Document URL
doc_url.description: URL to this FAIRtracks JSON document

doc_ontology_versions.title: Version URLs to Ontologies used
doc_ontology_versions.description: URLs to the version of the ontologies used in the JSON document

http://edamontology.org/EDAM.owl.title: Version URL to "EDAM Ontology"
http://edamontology.org/EDAM.owl.description: URL to the version of "Bioinformatics operations, data types, formats, identifiers and topics" (EDAM Ontology) used in the JSON document

http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/cl.owl.title: Version URL to "Cell Ontology"
http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/cl.owl.description: URL to the version of "Cell Ontology" used in the JSON document

http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/efo.owl.title: Version URL to "Experimental Factor Ontology"
http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/efo.owl.description: URL to the version of "Experimental Factor Ontology" used in the JSON document

http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ncit.owl.title: Version URL to "NCI Thesaurus OBO EDITION"
http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ncit.owl.description: URL to the version of "NCI Thesaurus OBO Edition" used in the JSON document

http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/obi.owl.title: Version URL to "Ontology for Biomedical Investigations"
http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/obi.owl.description: URL to the version of "Ontology for Biomedical Investigations" used in the JSON document

http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/so.owl.title: Version URL to "Sequence Ontology"
http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/so.owl.description: URL to the version of "Sequence types and features ontology" used in the JSON document

http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/uberon.ow.title: Version URL to "Uberon Ontology"
http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/uberon.ow.description: URL to the version of  "Uber-anatomy ontology" used in the JSON document

doc_version.title: Document Version
doc_version.description: Version of this FAIRtracks JSON document

doc_date.title: Document Creation Date
doc_date.description: Creation date of this version of this FAIRtracks document

collection_info.title: Track Collection Info
collection_info.description: General information about the track collection that is annotated in the current FAIRtracks JSON document

source_repo_url.title: Source Repo URL
source_repo_url.description: URL to the track repository containing the collection (e.g., the Track Hub Registry)

local_id.title: Local ID
local_id.description: Submitter-local identifier (within track repository) for the collection

doc_ref.title: Document Reference
doc_ref.description: Reference to the JSON document containing the study (using the  identifier of the document)

short_name.title: Name (Short)
short_name.description: Short name of the track collection. Suggested maximum length is 17 characters

long_name.title: Name (Long)
long_name.description: Long name of the track collection. Suggested maximum length is 80 characters
examples: Example of a few tracks created by from the ENCODE Project

description_url.title: Description URL
description_url.description: URL to a web page or file describing the track collection

orig_metadata_url.title: Original Metadata URL
orig_metadata_url.description: URL to track collection metadata in its original form (might contain more than the relevant metadata)

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: Contact information for the track collection

studies.title: Studies
studies.description: Array of JSON documents describing different studies that have produced data for the track collection

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.description: Array of JSON documents describing the different experiments that have produced data for the track collection

samples.title: Samples
samples.description: Array of JSON documents describing the different samples that have been analyzed to create the track collection

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.description: Array of JSON documents describing the different track files in the collection
